NOVA Build Pros

LIVINGSPACE DEALER

We are Northern Virginia's only authorized LivingSpace© Sunroom dealer. LivingSpace© Sunrooms are superior quality, provide year round outdoor living, and are more affordable than any other sunroom available, including Four Seasons Sunrooms.

VETERAN-OWNED SMALL BUSINESS

NOVA Build Pros is a veteran-owned, Class A General Contractor. We deliver outstanding quality and customer service to all of Northern Virginia. We also offer multiple financing options including 12 months same as cash making it convenient and easy on your budget. Call us today!

Service and Support

Our service and support team is committed to the high-level standards you expect as a customer.

They did an excellent job and I would certainly recommend them."

NOVA is a great company and we will certainly reach out to them for any future projects."

ABOUT NOVA Build Pros

Nova Build Pros delivers superior customer service to all of Northern Virginia. Our team of professionals has over 20 years of experience.
We are a Class A General Contractor offering remodeling services,roofing, siding, HVAC, electrical, and plumbing.
